name: Pull Request Template
about: Use this template for your pull requests
title: '[Type]: '
labels: ''
assignees: ''
---

## Description

Briefly describe what this PR does and why it's needed.

## Type of Change

Please mark the relevant options:

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (improving code structure without changing behavior)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Other (please describe)

## Related Issue

Fixes # (issue number)
Closes # (issue number)
Related to # (issue number)

## Changes Made

Describe the changes you've made in detail:

- [ ] Change 1
- [ ] Change 2

## Testing

Describe the tests you've done or how to verify this change:

- [ ] Unit tests pass
- [ ] Manual testing - describe steps
- [ ] Screenshot(s)

## Checklist

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](https://github.com/siliconflow-community/.github/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md) guide
- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code where necessary
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective (if applicable)
- [ ] All tests pass locally

## Additional Notes

Any additional information or context for reviewers.
